meanings.definition: A type of Indian sweet made from condensed milk and sugar.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious barfis at the Indian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My mom bought some barfis for dessert after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The barfis looked like little squares of happiness.
meanings.sent4: The barfis melted in my mouth like a sugary dream.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the barfis filled the room with sweetness.

meanings.sent1: I felt sick and had to barfis in the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: The dog barfised on the carpet, and I had to clean it up.
meanings.sent3: I hope I don't barfis during the roller coaster ride!
meanings.sent4: The bad smell made me want to barfis immediately.
meanings.sent5: The thought of eating that made me want to barfis.
